segments.text: Peter , which club do you want to join ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven't decided yet . What about you , Andy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am a member of the basketball club . Do you want to join us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I don't know how to play basketball .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's OK . Don't worry about it . Our school coach will train us to play basketball .
segments.speaker: S1
